name: 雕像的预言（ The prophecy of statues）
name_original: 雕像的预言（ The prophecy of statues）
description:
The Prophecy of the Statue is a first-person puzzle game I play to review the experiences of a kind of person.

It uses the characteristics of the sculpture to convey how these people come along and how to solve the puzzle. You can pass the puzzles by practicing skills.


Game features:
Solving puzzles in a comfortable environment
Use electricity to rotate objects, create electronic planes, or even transparently penetrate objects.
Exploring a story about leaving home
The way to solve riddles is not impossible.
